@graph.name: Route4Me Telematics Gateway for Fleet Management
@graph.description: Route4Me Telematics Gateway combines real-time and historical GPS data across all devices with last mile business operations data for better planning, execution and strategy. The platform unifies GPS data across all devices and platforms, bridging the gap between planned routes and actual execution through comprehensive telematics integrations. Route4Me's patented telematics gateway eliminates manual integration steps with direct interoperability support for modern telematics vendors including Geotab, Samsara, Motive, GPS Insight, and Teletrac Navman. The system enables tamper-proof tracking for compliance and loss prevention, automates tedious processes with IoT-enabled sensors, and provides bidirectional syncing that permits real-time feeds about dispatched routes and orders. This integration goes far beyond simple GPS tracking to include automated forecasting, modeling, and analysis while reducing back office time spent in spreadsheets through consolidated reporting capabilities.
